titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 411 Mount Holly Road in Fairdale, Kentucky, as the "Lance Corporal Robert A. Lynch Post Office Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H11226)
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
10/3/2007--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 411 Mount Holly Road in Fairdale, Kentucky, as the "Lance Corporal Robert A. Lynch Post Office Building."
